## Frisbee is a lickey pupper

```{r Read in data}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse); library(lubridate)

# read in 2010-2017 California air quality data
pm25 <- read_csv("data/pm25_annual-days-above-nat-24-hr-stnd.csv", na = "*") %>% group_by(county) %>% summarize(pm2010 = mean(pm2010, na.rm = T), pm2011 = mean(pm2011, na.rm = T), pm2012 = mean(pm2012, na.rm = T), pm2013 = mean(pm2013, na.rm = T), pm2014 = mean(pm2014, na.rm = T), pm2015 = mean(pm2015, na.rm = T), pm2016 = mean(pm2016, na.rm = T), pm2017 = mean(pm2017, na.rm = T))
pm25
```
